the fifteenth Ruling Steward of Gondor: South}}</ref> aged 110 years) was the fifteenth [[Ruling Steward]] of [[Gondor]].

{{disambig-two: Belecthor succeeded his father [[Húrin II]] at his death in Third Age 2628.<ref name="South"/>  The [[Corsairs of Umbar]] were the major threat to [[Gondor]] at the time, although no major events are recorded.{{fact}}
Belecthor had two children: [[Morwen (daughter of Belecthor)
He was followed by his son Orodreth at his death in 2655.<ref name="South"/>
Belecthor could be composed of the words ''[[beleg]]'' and ''[[thoron
the fifteenth Ruling Steward of Gondor: thôr]]'', therefore meaning "mighty eagle".<ref>''[[A Gateway to Sindarin]]'', David Salo, p. 343</ref>
